content: I fully agree with your sentiment. it is essential for cities to prioritize accessibility when designing and maintaining their transportation systems. it's crucial to ensure that everyone has equal access to public transportation, regardless of their abilities or disabilities. building an inclusive transportation system can help to create a more equitable and accessible society, making a significant difference in the lives of people with disabilities. so, i hope other cities can follow in the footsteps of seoul and take the necessary steps to improve accessibility in their transportation systems.
